item.title: ggmitji
item.description: p {text-align: justify;} Adrià Mitjavila on May 29, 2022 Look at the source code here. Look at the documentation here. ggmitji is an R package with cool functions to complement ggplots. Dependencies ggmitji depends on several packages, such as: ggplot2, magrittr, polyclip, cowplot, and ggpubr. Functions Boxplots without outliers If you don’t like to show the outliers in your boxplots, you can use stat_summary_boxplot().
